comments:
Plug-in installation : OK.
Plug-in Acivation : OK.

When I try to create a new COBOL project (File | New | Project | COBOL Project), when I push on the "Next" button...

Here is what I see in my error log window in Eclipse :

Error : Unhandled event loop exception
Error : org.eclipse.ui.internal.ide.IDEWorkbenchMessages.getString(Ljava/lang/String;)Ljava/lang/String;

...and...

org.eclipse.cobol.ui.wizards.projectmanagement.CustomWizardNewProjectCreationPage.

is using internal API which was changed in 3.1.

You should not call internal API for this reason.

Moving to community as COBOL is an inactive project

This is a bug with Fujitsu's plugin, not with the actual Eclipse COBOL project.

You need to report this bug to Fujitsu.

http://www.netcobol.com/

D.
